post.body: Feliz Navidad, brother. Drive safe!
dudette. nice to tweet with you. GO LAKERS!
don't sprain anything!!!
will be thinking of you when I watch the GAME! Should be good! A preview of the finals!
dude, go with your heart and emotions. We don't have a football team in LA and I root for Indy and NY. Love the Manning brothers.
next time they should get them from the Apple Store!
Tell me the story behind just decorating the Tree on Christmas Day? I have known other people to do that .
Ah, yes, gorgeous place. Been to Victoria. Love it up there.
Southern Cali - Redlands
That, is Christmas!
Where I live, I see snow from a great distance, on the Mts.
Surf's up . . . Mele Kalikimaka.!
Yes, Merry Christmas to you bro!
this is "before anything else. " Everyone is still in bed here on the Left Coast. I know, we are late. :=]
LOL, Yankees and Lakers, not bad! Now you get to watch either the Dodgers or Angels this year.
Well, I did it. Renee now owns a MacBook!
Okay, finally, got to open presents, sing "happy birthday Jesus." Prime is out . Rub will go on next, cook, and indulge! Whoa!
It is almost 10:00 am on the WC and the kids are in bed still. Time for Cinnamon rolls with pecans, frostings and gooie stuff all over it.
#tcot LAKER'S VS CELTICS TODAY. 2:00 pm. Is this a great Christmas present or what?
Coffee anyone?
